channel.title: Using different OS as workstation
channel.description: Let's say i'm using different OS as my workstation. How much i be hurting my anonymity if i use some not so popular linux distribution ? How much i stand out on tor network, on server side (when i browsing) ?

item.title: Using different OS as workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Have you seen https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems already?

When you use Tor Browser for browsing, fingerprint should not differ from other TBB / Whonix Tor Browsers users.

Read full topic
